resources.string: The Computer will deal each player two cards at random. Aces are high. Always have been, always will be.
If a player has a combined score of less than 16 they MUST hit. If a player has a score over 16, they cannot hit.
The winner is the player with the highest score. Any player with a score over 21 is declared bust.
If both players are bust, or the scores remain the same after 3 cards, the result is a draw.
